data.scheme_name: Haryana AatmaNirbhar Textile Policy 2022-25 - Investment Subsidy in lieu of Net SGST - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides subsidy of 50% of Net SGST for 10 years, capped at 125% of FCI to encourage investments in the textile sector.
data.eligibility: All existing units engaged in textile activities and any project undertaking expansion/diversification/modernization during the operative period of the policy are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
1. MSMEs must have URC.
  2. Units must obtain GST registration.
  3. Units should not be on the restrictive list by the State government.
  4. Unit must be in commercial production.
  5. Regular production is necessary for subsidy disbursement.
  6. Incentives don't apply if tax liabilities arise due to fraud or similar issues.
  7. Incentives not given for unclaimed tax credits (e.g., late filing or fraudulent conduct).
  8. Only eligible products should be manufactured to avail benefits.
  9. No other business allowed under the same registration.
  10. EEU must use available credit to pay State GST liability first.
data.beneficiaries: All existing units engaged in textile activities and any project undertaking expansion/diversification/modernization during the operative period of the policy are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. MSMEs must have URC.
  2. Units must obtain GST registration.
  3. Units should not be on the restrictive list by the State government.
  4. Unit must be in commercial production.
  5. Regular production is necessary for subsidy disbursement.
  6. Incentives don't apply if tax liabilities arise due to fraud or similar issues.
  7. Incentives not given for unclaimed tax credits (e.g., late filing or fraudulent conduct).
  8. Only eligible products should be manufactured to avail benefits.
  9. No other business allowed under the same registration.
  10. EEU must use available credit to pay State GST liability first.
data.nodal_agency: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.context: Through this scheme, the Government will provide financial assistance for creating besting-class manufacturing infrastructure, upgradation of technology, promotion of textile products across value chain particularly technical textiles and manmade fibers, backward integration, increase in exports thereby resulting in overall development of the textile sector in the state.
data.objective: The main objective of the scheme is to attract investments and generate employment in the State’s textile sector across its value chain.
data.description:
1. Scheme provides investment subsidy to encourage investments in the textile sector:
    • B category blocks: 25% of Net SGST for 8 years, capped at 100% of FCI.
    • C & D category blocks: 50% of Net SGST for 10 years, capped at 125% of FCI.
  2. The benefit applies to units making 25% additional investment in plant and machinery for expansion/diversification, with a cap of 100% on the new fixed capital investment.
data.how_to_apply:
Submit application for Investment subsidy on prescribed Form (Annexure-I) and required documents along with the application within three months of the financial year closing or the scheme notification date, whichever is later on the Directorate’s web portal.
Annexure-I: https://cdnbbsr.s3waas.gov.in/s3f48c04ffab49ff0e5d1176244fdfb65c/uploads/2023/07/2023070674.pdf
data.funding_facilitator: Director General, Directorate of MSME of Haryana
data.funding_mechanism: Subsidy would be given after submission of claim provided it is within three months of the closing of the financial year of which incentive is being claimed or from the date of notification of the scheme, whichever is later.
data.checklist_info_a:
Copy of Industrial Entrepreneur Memorandum (IEM), Latest URC and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM).
Certificate of Incorporation/ Registered Partnership Deed with concerned DIC/ Co-operative Society Registration
Copy of Board Resolution/ Power of Attorney
CA Certificate as per Annexure-II
List of new Plant & Machinery as per Annexure-III.
Copies of the purchase invoices of plant & machinery/ equipment in sequence of the details mentioned under Annexure-III.
Copy of GST Return/Audited balance sheet of the unit of last year (wherever applicable).
Certificate from Deputy Excise & Taxation Commissioner as per Annexure IV or Annexure-IV-A or Annexure-IV-B as applicable).
Copy of first Sale bill.
Copy of sale deed/Registered lease deed
Affidavit as per Annexure – V
data.checklist_info_d:
Address: Plot No. C-3, HSVP Complex, Sector 6, Panchkula – 134109
Phone: 0172-2580707
Email ID: info-msme@hry.gov.in
data.beneficiary: Textile Industry - All Entities - Haryana - All MSMEs
